solution_line_template: If the number of salmons in the river increased by ten times the number initially there, then {initial_salmon}*{increase_multiplier} = <<{initial_salmon}*{increase_multiplier}={new_salmon_migrated}>>{new_salmon_migrated} new salmons migrated up the river.
The total number of salmon in the river now is {new_salmon_migrated}+{initial_salmon} = <<{new_salmon_migrated}+{initial_salmon}={total_salmon_now}>>{total_salmon_now}
